biotools.summary: MEDUSA (Multiclass flexibility prediction from sequences of amino acids) is a deep learning approach for prediction of protein flexibility from sequence. MEDUSA takes as input an amino acid sequence and returns a flexibility class of each residue in terms of the expected normalized B-factor value range. Prediction is simultaneously performed in two-, three- and five classes using a convolutional neural network trained on a dataset of non-redundant X-ray structures.

bioschemas.name: MEDUSA

MEDUSA takes as input an amino acid sequence and returns a flexibility class of each residue in terms of the expected normalized B-factor value range. Prediction is simultaneously performed in two-, three- and five classes using a convolutional neural network trained on a dataset of non-redundant X-ray structures.
